casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Edwards ARRINGTON 280A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2017 *735James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Arrington, James Edward. Tracy Nayer, Assistant Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of August 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2017."
